title: Classic Vampire
prompt: Turn this photo into a classic vampire portrait at night; pale makeup, subtle fangs, satin cape; preserve my identity and hair; keep background as a foggy graveyard extension of the original; cinematic contrast; no gore.

title: Elegant Witch
prompt: Make me a witch wearing matte-black wide-brim hat, velvet cloak, smoky eyeliner; add faint green rim-light; keep my real face and haircut; match my pose; add floating candles; tasteful, not campy.

title: Ghost Bride
prompt: Convert to ghost bride: translucent veil, Victorian lace dress, soft motion blur at edges; keep my facial identity; add cool moonlight; background gently desaturated.

title: Werewolf Transformation
prompt: Turn me into a werewolf halfway-transforming: subtle fur along jawline/hands, amber eyes, torn jacket; keep face structure recognizable; no body horror.

title: Pumpkin Trick-or-Treater
prompt: Make me a pumpkin-headed trick-or-treater: pumpkin mask with carved smile; warm candle glow inside; preserve my body proportions/pose; add fallen leaves on ground; cozy not scary.

title: Wednesday Core
prompt: Style me as Wednesday-core: black dress with white collar, braided hair effect matching my current length, neutral expression, school hallway background; keep real face.

title: Mummy Wrap
prompt: Mummy wrap overlay: linen bandages with shadows matching lighting; leave one eye visible; keep identity; add museum-display vibe in background.

title: Grim Reaper
prompt: Grim reaper clean aesthetic: sleek hood, matte scythe, fog; keep my face partly visible; monochrome with silver accents; no gore.

title: Steampunk Hunter
prompt: Steampunk vampire hunter: leather straps, brass goggles on forehead, old lantern in off-hand; keep identity; background becomes cobblestone alley with gas lamps.

title: Forest Dryad
prompt: Forest dryad: leaf crown, vine tattoos (temporary look), soft backlight bokeh; keep identity; warm autumn palette.

title: Glam Cat
prompt: Apply glam Halloween cat makeup: black liner extending to whisker dots, soft smoky eye, glossy nude lip; keep skin texture; no plastic look.

title: Siren Mermaid
prompt: Siren/mermaid SFX: teal-purple duochrome eye, subtle scale pattern around temples, wet-look hair; preserve face; light sea-spray highlight.

title: Pop Art Comic
prompt: Pop-art comic panel makeup: halftone dots, bold outlines, speech bubble 'Trick or Treat!'; keep identity; white seamless background.

title: Sugar Skull
prompt: Sugar skull (calavera) soft version: floral forehead motif, symmetrical linework, pastel palette; respect cultural motif tastefully; keep face.

title: Haunted Library
prompt: Place me in a haunted library: towering shelves, floating books, cool moonbeam through window; match my original lighting on face; light fog at ankles.

title: Porch Pumpkins
prompt: Set me on a porch with jack-o'-lanterns at dusk; warm candlelight reflections on skin; keep outfit; add subtle breath vapor.

title: 80s Slasher Poster
prompt: Make it 80s slasher poster style: grainy film texture, bold title above me ('HALLOWEEN NIGHT'), orange/blue color split; keep identity.

title: Tim Burton Town
prompt: Tim Burton-inspired crooked town square, elongated shadows; preserve my face; slightly oversized eyes but still realistic.

title: Coven Group
prompt: Group photo into matching witch coven: coordinated hats/cloaks per person, color accents unique to each; identities preserved; balanced composition.

title: Dog Pumpkin Rider
prompt: Turn my dog into a little pumpkin rider: tiny witch riding costume on back; keep pet's fur/eyes; warm porch lighting.

title: Ghost Family
prompt: A friendly ghost family trick-or-treating under streetlights; cozy suburban block with orange leaves; soft lens; Pixar-adjacent charm.

title: Black Cat & Pumpkin
prompt: Black cat perched on glowing jack-o'-lantern, gentle fog, fireflies; shallow depth of field; child-safe mood.

title: Pumpkin Patch
prompt: Pumpkin patch at golden hour with kids in DIY costumes, candid smiles; natural light; magazine editorial feel.

title: Kawaii Candy Shop
prompt: Kawaii candy shop on Halloween night, pastel palette, chibi customers, neatly labeled jars; clean vector style.

title: Victorian Manor
prompt: A Victorian manor at midnight, one window lit, long shadows, light rain on stone path; cinematic realism, no gore.

title: Forest Fog
prompt: Forest fog with a single lantern in the distance; high dynamic range; subtle silhouette; suspenseful, not violent.

title: Old Carnival
prompt: Old carnival at dusk: faded banners, carousel frozen mid-turn; warm bulbs + cool twilight; filmic grain.

title: Anime Witch

prompt: Retro Halloween poster 1950s: limited color inks, big typography, clean negative space.

prompt: Pixel-art graveyard tileset, 32Ã—32 tiles, compatible with platformer; readable silhouettes.
